_pattern.value: Business identifier for biologically derived product dispense

Business identifiers assigned to this biologically derived product dispense by the performer and/or other systems. These identifiers remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

resource.value: Unique instance identifiers assigned to a biologically derived product dispense. Note: This is a business identifier, not a resource identifier.

_pattern.value: Note: This is a business identifier, not a resource identifier (see [discussion](resource.html#identifiers)). It is best practice for the identifier to only appear on a single resource instance, however business practices may occasionally dictate that multiple resource instances with the same identifier can exist - possibly even with different resource types. For example, multiple Patient and a Person resource instance might share the same social insurance number.
Allows identification of the biologically derived product dispense as it is known by various participating systems and in a way that remains consistent across servers.
Fulfills plan, proposal or order

resource.value: The order or request that this dispense is fulfilling

_pattern.value: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this biologically derived product dispense.

resource.value: The order or request that the dispense is fulfilling. This is a reference to a ServiceRequest resource.

_pattern.value: Allows tracing of authorization for the biologically derived product dispense and tracking whether proposals/recommendations were acted upon.
A larger event of which this particular biologically derived product dispense is a component or step.

resource.value: A larger event of which this particular event is a component.

_pattern.value: Not to be used to link an biologically derived product dispense to an Encounter - use 'context' for that.
preparation | in-progress | not-done | suspended | aborted | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

resource.value: preparation | in-progress | allocated | issued | unfulfilled | returned | entered-in-error | unknown

_pattern.value: The current state of the biologically derived product dispense.

resource.value: A code specifying the state of the dispense event.

_pattern.value:
A nominal state-transition diagram can be found in the (Event pattern documentation
Unknown does not represent "other" - one of the defined statuses must apply. Unknown is used when the authoring system is not sure what the current status is.
Product used/provided
Indicates the product supplied or manipulated by this biologically derived product dispense.

resource.value: A link to a resource identifying the biologically derived product that is being dispensed.

_pattern.value: Individual service was done for/to

resource.value: The intended recipient(s) of the dispensed product

_pattern.value: The individual or set of individuals the action is being or was performed on.

resource.value: A link to a resource representing the individual(s) that the product is dispensed for.

_pattern.value: Links the biologically derived product dispense to the Patient context. May also affect access control.
Who performed biologically derived product dispense and what they did

resource.value: Indicates who or what performed an action

_pattern.value: Indicates who or what performed the biologically derived product dispense and how they were involved.

resource.value: Indicates who or what performed an action.

_pattern.value: Where biologically derived product dispense occurred
The principal physical location where the biologically derived product dispense was performed.

resource.value: The physical location where the dispense was performed.

_pattern.value: Ties the event to where the records are likely kept and provides context around the event occurrence (e.g. if it occurred inside or outside a dedicated healthcare setting).
Comments made about the event
Comments made about the biologically derived product dispense by the performer, subject or other participants.
